Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label different land habitats (e.g., playground, garden, forest).
The student can draw and label different water habitats (e.g., pond, stream, lake).
The student can illustrate various types of plants found in each habitat.
The student can illustrate various types of animals found in each habitat.
The student can show comparisons between the different kinds of living things in each habitat.
The student can use their drawing to highlight patterns of plant and animal diversity across habitats.
